judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated and the record is remanded for further proceedings and consideration in the light of our decision in Re: Nomination Paper of Thomas E. Welsh for the Sixth (6) Senatorial District. 458 Pa. 645 (1974).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: I). S. Heller, with him John M. Gallagher, Jr., for appellant.
Larrick B. Stapleton, with him Franchot Golub and Benjamin Shuster, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Salera Appeal.
Argued October 3, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
I). S. Heller, with him John M. Gallagher, Jr., for appellant.
Larrick B. Stapleton, with him Franchot Golub and Benjamin Shuster, for appellee.
October 10, 1974:
